content:
next one is "Near-Life Experience": When your time comes, you won’t know what hit you
Like a bolt from the cloudless blue that couldn’t miss you
Like a match that was born to burn
The giant bound to learn that when you play with fire
their flame will play with you

This is a near life experience
Experience that love
Fighting to live my life before it’s taken away

that would take me higher
